Uses of Interface
com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image.ImageTransform

  • Packages that use ImageTransform 
    Package Description
    com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image  

    • Uses of ImageTransform in com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image

      Subinterfaces of ImageTransform in com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  StaticImageTransform
      A transformation that can be applied to a BufferedImage as a whole, but which does not modify the dimensions of the image (like color reduction or fill).
      Classes in com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image that implement ImageTransform 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ApplyAffineTransform
      Applies an AffineTransform to a given image.
      class  ApplyPixelTransform
      Applies a PixelTransform to every pixel of a given image that's contained within a masking shape.
      class  BufferedImageOpTransform
      Transforms an image by applying a BufferedImageOp to it.
      class  ColorReductionTransform
      Converts the color space of an image to a reduced palette containing no more than a specified number of colors.
      class  ConvolutionTransform
      Convolves an image by applying an image Kernel to each pixel.
      class  FillTransform
      Fills every transparent pixel of an image that lies within a given mask with a specified paint or texture.
      class  FloodFillTransform
      Performs a "flood fill" (sometimes called "seed fill" or "spill paint") of the image with a provided paint or texture.
      class  GreyscaleReductionTransform
      Transform an image to a gray-scale containing no more than the specified number of gray shades.
      class  ProjectionTransform
      Performs a projection of the source image onto an arbitrary quadrilateral.
      class  RubbersheetTransform
      Performs a rubber-sheet projection of the source image onto an arbitrary quadrilateral.
      class  ScaleTransform
      Transforms an image by scaling it to a specified dimension.
      class  SlantTransform
      Vertically slants (shears) an image by a given angle and applies an x-translation to compensate for the change in position implied by the slant (allows the vertical center-line to remain constant, if desired).
